thread.title: Yale Professor Who Had Controversial Role in the Crisis Now Teaches About It

author: Alexander Osipovich
title: Yale Professor Who Had Controversial Role in the Crisis Now Teaches About It
text:
A decade after the financial crisis, The Wall Street Journal has checked in on dozens of the bankers, government officials, chief executives, hedge-fund managers and others who left a mark on that period to find out what they are doing now. Today, we spotlight Blythe Masters and Gary Gorton.
This spring, Gary Gorton taught a class at Yale University on financial crises. Itâ€™s a topic that the 66-year-old academic knows about firsthand.
...
